original_text: And the rest were slain by the sword that came from the mouth of him who was sitting on the horse, and all the birds were gorged with their flesh.
korean_text: 그 나머지는 말 탄 자의 입으로부터 나오는 검에 죽으매 모든 새가 그들의 살로 배불리더라

sentences.original_text: And the rest were slain by the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나머지는 그 칼로 죽임을 당했다

sentences.original_text: of him who was sitting on the horse
and all the birds were gorged with their flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 새들은 그들의 살로 배를 채웠다
